table.name: agentservices_tasky_agent_states_v2
table.description: Contains Tasky agent state change events

table.description: Stores metadata against each Tasky agent allocation

table.description: Contains Tasky reviewer offline events with reason

table.description: Contains Tasky task state change events

table.name: agentservices_tasky_tasks_events
table.description: Tasky task action events (accepted, declined, missed)

table.name: av_agent_offline_reasons
table.description: Contains reasons for operator going offline

column.description: Duration for which agent was offline

table.name: av_allocation_events
table.description: Stores metadata for operator allocation to Users

table.name: av_call_details
table.description: Contains customer/task and operator events

table.name: av_call_events
table.description: Contains customer/task events before it gets allocated

table.name: av_completed_profiles
table.description: Contains details of the Profiles which are completed. Profiles which are either marked as Accepted or Rejected or UTV

column.description: Time duration from profile creation to completion
Call duration of the task
Customer's wait time
Time duration from first link open by customer to profile completion
Time duration from profile creation to link clicked
Time taken by agent to perform review on the profile. Review start to review completion.
Time duration from link clicked to start of video call
Total duration taken by customer including video call
Time duration from first link opened by customer to when profile went to review required
Time taken for Video Composition of recordings
No of capture journeys completed for a profile done by customer. Based on Capture ID.
No of capture journeys attempted for a profile done by customer. Based on capture sessions.
Total number of video calls done by the customer
No of UTV tasks for the profile due to technical reasons
No of UTV tasks for the profile due to business reasons

table.name: av_completed_tasks_v2
table.description: Contains details of the tasks which are completed by the agent. Contains UTV reasons for the tasks

column.description: Duration of video call
MSC configuration flag
Average outgoing bitrate of customer during video call
Average incoming bitrate of customer during video call
Average outgoing bitrate of operator during video call
Average incoming bitrate of operator during video call

P90 customer audio level of speaker
P90 operator audio level of mic
P90 operator audio level of speaker
No of reconnects triggered by customer during the call
No of reconnects triggered by operator during the call

No of manual reconnects triggered by operator during the call

No of successful bandwidth check done before video call
Average bandwidth of bandwidth check done before video call
No of failed bandwidth check done before video call
Average bandwidth of failed bandwidth check done before video call

Bandwidth check TAT of attempt 2
Bandwidth check TAT of attempt 3
Count of health check performed

P90 customer outgoing Round Trip Time

table.name: av_operator_action
table.description: Contains details about the actions taken by the Agent on the Task

table.name: av_operator_activity_stats
table.description: Contains aggregate details about agent actions like InCallTime, SuspendedTime etc

column.description: Total time duration for which operator was active
Total time spent by operator in suspended state
Total time spent by operator in allocated state

table.name: av_operator_events
table.description: Operator events before allocation

table.name: av_operator_hourly_stats
table.description: Contains information about number of calls allocated, accepted, rejected and missed by the operator per hour

column.description: No of calls allocated
No of incoming calls accepted
No of incoming calls where no action was taken
No of incoming calls declined
No of calls completed
No of completed calls marked as Verified
No of completed calls marked as Rejected
No of completed calls marked as Unable To Verify
No of completed calls marked as Unable To Verify due to business reasons
No of completed calls marked as Unable To Verify due to technical reasons reasons
Time spent in video call in seconds
Average outgoing bitrate of operator
Average incoming bitrate of operator
P90 outgoing bitrate of operator
P90 incoming bitrate of operator
P90 audio level of mic
P90 audio level of speaker
Total no of reconnects triggered on the operator side
Total no of auto reconnects triggered on the operator side
Total no of manual reconnects triggered on the operator side

table.name: av_operator_state
table.description: Contains information about state of agent. Records when the agent goes offline and comes back online.

table.name: av_reconnect_details
table.description: Contains reasons and details of call reconnection. Includes information about whether the reconnect was Auto or Manual and Reconnection reason

column.description: Time taken to perform the reconnect
TAT to invoke GetUserMedia (get camera access)

table.name: av_session_meta
table.description: Metadata of each AssistedVideo task session

table.name: av_session_queue_wait_time_summary

column.description: Time for which customer was waiting in the queue

Attempted height of image being captured
Actual height of image being captured

table.name: capture_funnel
table.description: Contains page navigation summary for each Capture Session. Useful to get user drop off data. Each row represents a Capture Session.

table.name: capture_funnel_timeline
table.description: Contains page navigation events for Capture Session. Each row represents individual navigation.

column.description: Time spent by the customer on the current page
Total time spent by the customer from journey start to the current page
Time spent by the customer on the previous page

table.name: capture_media_stream_ended_events

table.name: msc_webrtc_stats

column.description: Round Trip Time
Height of video being transmitted
Represents audio level/loudness
Accumulated total audio energy from the start of the call
Total bytes of audio stream transmitted form start of call
Packets lost of audio stream
Audio stream latency
Audio jitter
Time spent by audio packets in the jitter buffer before being decoded
